Constipation or Ileus: No change in next dose. Treatment of constipation symptoms may be offered as available in line with local standard of care.

Hold dose; institute aggressive regimen to treat constipation if present. When symptoms reduce to ≤ grade 3 resume at 50% of calculated dose (maximum dose: 1 mg) and escalate to full dose as tolerated.

Event Name: Participants requiring > two dose reductions should go off protocol therapy.
